categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode IX The Rise of Skywalker actors

nodes.text: Ashley Beck is a British an actor, stunt performer, martial artist and motion capture artist who portrayed the Knight of Ren Ushar in the 2019 film Star Wars: Episode IX The Rise of Skywalker. He also served as a stunt double for the 2018 anthology film Solo: A Star Wars Story.

Beck is a professional stunt performer who has trained all his life in different martial arts styles and acrobatics. He is a three times World Champion in forms and weapons, and an experienced motion capture artist. Between 2003 and 2011, he served as a motion capture artist 30 movies and video games. In 2011, he qualified for the British Stunt Register.
